attributes.action: Sack UK prime minister over his poor handling of the COVID-19 & school children
attributes.background: I want the PM to protect all children and close schools, as they have in other countries. His herd mentality is not the public opinion only his opinion.

rejection.details:
We can't publish petitions about appointments. That includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or to resign.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
